link.choosekeep_text: We have detected another account.\nWich one do you want to use?

link.restore_auto_text: We have detected a new account associated with yout game ID:\n{0}\nDo you want to load it?

gameloading.maintenance_mode_message: We are performing scheduled maintenance.\nWe should be back online shortly.

gameloading.invalid_security_token_messa: The game state has been corrupted and cannot recoverered automatically.\nPlease contact our support team or restart the game.

gameloading.invalid_privilege_token_mess: The game will restart without privilege token.

link.chooserestore_text: We have found another account with higher progress.\nWich one do you want to use?

gameloading.restart_game_message: This action will delete all your progress and data, are you sure you want to restart your game?

gameloading.connection_error_message: Could not reach the server. Please check your connection and try again.

link.restore_error_text: There is no other state related to your link

link.finish_text: Your account is linked and you will be able to move it to another device.

link.save_text: You need to login to be able to save your account

link.chooselower_text: You can't restore an account with a lower progress.\nPlease contact with our support if you want to restore it.

gameloading.response_error_message: There was an unknown error logging in. Please try again later.
